title: Replace Health Insights tile label and logging from Energy Levels to PCOD & PCOS Risks

requirements.summary: Replace the existing "Energy Levels" Health Insights tile label with "PCOD & PCOS Risks" on the /home dashboard without changing other tiles.
acceptanceCriteria: On the /home dashboard, within the "Health Insights" grid, the tile label reads "PCOD & PCOS Risks" instead of "Energy Levels".
No other tiles in the "Health Insights" section are removed or renamed.

file_operations.description: In the Health Insights grid, update the DashboardTile currently labeled "Energy Levels" to instead use the label "PCOD & PCOS Risks" while keeping the rest of the tiles unchanged.

requirements.summary: Update the click handler/logging for the replaced tile to reference PCOD & PCOS risks instead of energy predictions.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "PCOD & PCOS Risks" tile triggers a handler/log message that references PCOD & PCOS risks rather than energy.

file_operations.description: Update the onClick handler/log message for the tile that was previously "Energy Levels" so it no longer references energy predictions and instead references PCOD & PCOS risks (no user-facing text changes beyond the tile label).
